title: Modern Downtown Apartment
description: Beautiful modern apartment in the heart of downtown Seattle. Features floor-to-ceiling windows, stainless steel appliances, and a rooftop terrace.

title: Cozy Suburban House
description: Charming family home in quiet neighborhood. Large backyard, updated kitchen, and close to excellent schools.

title: Luxury Waterfront Condo
description: Stunning waterfront condo with panoramic lake views. Premium finishes throughout and access to private beach.

title: Studio Loft in Art District
address: 321 Creative Lane, Capitol Hill, Seattle, WA
description: Hip studio loft in the trendy Capitol Hill art district. High ceilings, exposed brick, and walking distance to galleries and cafes.

title: Family Home with Large Yard
description: Spacious family home perfect for growing families. Large fenced yard, modern appliances, and great school district.

title: Penthouse with City Views
description: Exclusive penthouse with breathtaking city and mountain views. Top-floor unit with private elevator access and premium amenities.

title: Affordable Starter Home
description: Great starter home in established neighborhood. Recent updates include new roof and HVAC system. Perfect for first-time buyers.

title: Luxury Townhouse
description: Contemporary townhouse in gated community. Open floor plan, high-end finishes, and access to community amenities.
